articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Namibian Government Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Namibian Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the government delegation of the Republic of Namibia headed by Foreign Minister Marco Hausiku which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Namibian Government Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Namibian Government Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The government delegation of the Republic of Namibia headed by Foreign Minister Marco Hausiku arrived here on Monday.
					 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Kim Hyong Jun, vice- minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Sports of Myanmar Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Sports of Myanmar Here
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Sports of Myanmar led by its Minister Aye Myint arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Agent for Preserving Kimjongilia Developed
articles.content:
Agent for Preserving Kimjongilia Developed
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Research Center has recently developed agent for keeping Kimjongilia in bloom for a long time.
					It is the unanimous desire of the Korean and the world people to preserve Kimjongilia, "king of flowers," for a long time.
					
					At the end of years of study, the researchers completed the preservation agent by the method of proper combination of various kinds of sugar with organic acids, microelements, physiological activated material and natural activated inter-phase material.
					
					The agent makes the flower fresh for a long while by raising the resistance against withering and the capacity of the flower to absorb and store water.
					
					Also it has enough organic nourishing materials to open larger flower.
					
					The research team has applied the agent to various units and verified its effect. The result shows that the blooming period of Kimjongilia is longer than that of the previous one.
					
					According to the users, the agent makes it possible to keep the flower in fresh state for a long time without giving any hindrance to its growth so as to open the immortal flower more wonderfully.

articles.title: Korean People's Outlook on Life
articles.content:
Korean People's Outlook on Life
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean people live and strive in a revolutionary manner with the lofty outlook on life -- "Let us live not for today but for tomorrow!"
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il implanted this revolutionary view of life in the hearts of the Korean people during the "Arduous March."
					
					 The aphorism means that a man should live with a determination to dedicate his all to the future of the motherland and the happiness of the posterity though he does not enjoy the pleasure in his generation.
					
					 Having optimism about the future and the lofty mental world to leap higher, the Korean people made a new history of great creation and change without any pessimism and vacillation in the crucible of grim ordeals of the 1990s to which others might give themselves up one hundred times.
					
					 They carried out projects in a bold and big way with unexcelled pluck, with the result that they facelifted the looks of the territory and constructed power stations, modern production bases and other  monumental creations in many parts of the country.
					
					 These laudable successes give to the Korean people confidence and optimism that the long arduous march will certainly entail prosperity and happiness and arouse them more powerfully to the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					 The lofty outlook on life is well illustrated by the fact that the whole country is replete with the habit of optimistic and emotional life.
					
					 As the revolutionary soldier culture created by the People's Army has an influence on the society, the every nook and corner of the country is full of militant spirit and fervor, the socialist way of life and the fine folk traditions are carried forward firmly and the life environment is improved day by day.
					
					 Under the slogan "Push ahead through the thorny path in high spirits!" all the people are leading a confidence- and optimism-filled life while conducting mass cultural work and mass physical culture and sports activities.
					
					 The revolutionary view of life is an ideological and spiritual source that makes it possible to bring the construction of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country to victory.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition for World Supremacy Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition for World Supremacy Blasted 
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has recently staged the first test flight of B-52H equipped with laser-controlled guided missiles. This missile is the latest-type weapon called "juggler" which has been improved on the basis of the experience gained from the armed conflicts and others since its first use in the 1960s.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed commentary carried in this regard observes that the test flight of the above-said strategic bomber is a product of the U.S. policy of strength and its wild ambition for supremacy.
					
					 The arms buildup and modernization of weaponry stepped up by the U.S. under the pretext of protecting its "security" from the "threat" from someone and "defending" its allies are part of its war moves to realize its wild ambition for world supremacy with upper-hand in strength, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. bellicose forces are pursuing a high-handed military policy, not away from their outdated viewpoint and way of thinking dating back to the era of Cold War that strength precisely means "justice" and the U.S. position is guaranteed by strength.
					
					 The above-said moves find a vivid manifestation in south Korea and its vicinity. The U.S. imperialists have deployed new mobile strike forces in south Korea. They, at the same time, deployed a nuclear-powered carrier in Japan on a permanent basis for the first time, while reinforcing strategic offensive forces in Guam, a military base for invading the DPRK.
					
					 This is a revelation of the U.S. stand for military confrontation with the DPRK and the move to round off the preparations for another Korean war, a violation of the points agreed upon at the six-party talks. The U.S. is employing double-dealing tactics, giving more importance to military strength in the relations with the DPRK. This method is only making issues more complicated. The U.S. war-like forces' military high-handed policy does not work on the DPRK.
					
					 What is essential for the relations between the DPRK and the U.S. is to build bilateral confidence. This is more urgently required by the present circumstances. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to roll back its anachronistic policy to stifle the DPRK by force of arms but opt for building confidence with the DPRK.
					
					 It is daydream for the U.S. to realize its wild ambition for world supremacy with upper-hand in strength. Bearing this in mind, it had better stop its reckless moves for military confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of Chilling Humanitarian Work
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of Chilling Humanitarian Work
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the Lee Myung Bak group nominated Ryu Jong Ha, an ill-famed confrontational maniac, as president of the south Korean Red Cross who would handle the issues of north-south relations. This clearly testifies to the fact that they remain unchanged in their intention to bedevil the inter-Korean relations, far from standing for reconciliation, unity and cooperation with fellow countrymen. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on: This is nothing but a reckless action diametrically running counter to the basic spirit of the Red Cross the essence of which is humanitarianism. It is a treacherous and anti-reunification act as it is little short of rubbing salt in the wound of the Koreans undergoing the sufferings resulting from the division and pushing the crisis-ridden inter-Korean relations to uncontrollable catastrophe.
					
					 The Lee group put ill-famed confrontational maniacs at the posts of the minister of "Unification" and president of the "Institute for Unification Studies" in charge of the exchange and cooperation between the north and the south. This proves that their moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen are the carefully worked out deliberate and premeditated provocation. The nomination of Ryu as president of the Red Cross is an extension of such moves.
					
					The action taken by the Lee group to let ultra-right conservatives steeped in the anti-DPRK confrontational concept to the marrow of their bones hold key posts at the institutions handling important issues of north-south relations in contravention of the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration proves that they have no willingness to improve the north-south relations and work for reunification.
					
					 The Lee group is a group of wicked anti-reunification elements as they are keen on distrust and confrontation between the north and the south while blocking the advance of the June 15 era of reunification and a cancer-like entity standing in the way of unity and reunification. 
					
					The south Korean rulers had better take the stand of serving the nation and behave themselves, cogitating about the serious consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK confrontational concept and moves.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Is Bound to Meet Destruction
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Is Bound to Meet Destruction
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The reactionaries of history challenging the trend of the June 15 era of reunification are bound to meet destruction, warns Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 The Lee group has worked hard to bring to naught all the achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification while calling for making up for the "lost decade" since its seizure of power, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The group of traitors have slandered the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes common to the nation for independent reunification, and hamstrung the efforts to implement them, blustering that "unification on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration should never be allowed" and "the present government is not obliged to honor the commitments which the preceding government made".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the group has gone so fool as to seek to pull down the system in the north while raising a hue and cry over the "emergency situation", seized with the wild ambition for "unification through the absorption of the north". 
					
					 The Lee group has totally negated the historic north-south joint declarations and their basic ideas, describing the June 15 era of reunification as the "lost decade" though it paved a wide avenue for reconciliation and unity of the nation and dared defame even the supreme dignity of the DPRK while pursuing anachronistic confrontational policy. This is a never-to-be pardoned politically-motivated provocation.
					
					The group's reckless confrontational racket is an intolerable act of treachery aimed to stem the trend of the nation's history toward independent reunification and peace and prosperity in collusion with outsiders, bring the north-south relations back to those in the past and thus perpetuate the national division and do harm to the DPRK with the backing of outsiders.
					
					The stand and attitude to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as a touchstone discerning harmony between the north and the south from confrontation and reunification from division.
					
					 The improvement of the north-south relations and the progress of the cause of national reunification entirely depend on the successful implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for putting it into practice. The north-south relations would be unthinkable without implementing the above-said declarations.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification is sure to make steady dynamic progress and bring about the new victorious history of independent reunification and peace and prosperity by throwing overboard the ultra-right conservative anti-reunification forces keen on sycophancy toward the U.S., the article concludes.

articles.title: Apology and Reparation to Victims of "Comfort Women" for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Apology and Reparation to Victims of "Comfort Women" for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The 835th Wednesday Rally took place in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on October 15 to demand the settlement of the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					Present there were members of the Federation of Women's Organizations of south Korea and victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					A statement which was read out at the rally said that all circles have struggled together with the victims in demand of apology and reparation from the Japanese authorities as regards the issue of "comfort women". It denounced Japan for doggedly negating its past crimes and behaving so mean in a bid to evade its responsibility for them till now.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" and the "National Assembly" to pay full attention to this issue, strive to settle the issue of the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and actively counter Japan's distortion of history.
					
					 It stressed that Japan should lend an ear to the voices of survivors who suffered from the atrocities committed by the imperialists and make an official apology and legal reparation.

articles.title: Suppression of Jongyojo under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of Jongyojo under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) called a press conference in front of the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on October 16 at which it denounced actions of the conservative forces to eliminate it.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the "people's federation to put an end to anti-state education" which was recently formed with conservative forces filed a suit with the prosecution against Jongyojo, branding it as an "enemy-benefiting organization".
					
					 They noted that they would struggle against the frantic moves of the conservative group to deny the achievements made in the struggle for democracy and turn back clock of history.
					
					 Then a press release was read out at the conference. It said that the conservative forces are now making desperate efforts to insult the activities of Jongyojo and obliterate it. They cannot brand the activities of Jongyojo as "illegal" unless they are intended to bring back the Cold War era, it added.
					
					 At the end of the press conference Jongyojo handed to the prosecution a written document indicting the above-said conservative organization for its crimes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Movement Organizations under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Movement Organizations under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The suppression of the organizations of the progressive movement has entered a very grave phase in south Korea these days. A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland issued a statement on Sunday in this connection. 
					 The Lee Myung Bak fascist clique is kicking up a whirlwind of wholesale arrest and suppression of members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the All-People Measure Council against the Total Opening of south Korean Markets to American Beef and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea who took the lead in the just struggle for the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and the vital rights of the people despite the unanimous rebuff and denunciation at home and abroad, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					The fascist clique is cracking down on the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the Teachers Union, the Council of Youth Organizations and other pro-reunification patriotic organizations of south Korea which have promoted the June 15 reunification movement and independence and democratization of south Korean society, after branding them as "enemy-benefiting organizations" and "pro-north leftist forces" on charge of the violation of the "National Security Law" and imposing harsh penalties upon pro-reunification patriots after arresting them one after another.
					
					 This clearly indicates that the Lee group is keen to totally eliminate organizations and figures of the organizations aspiring after independence and democratization of south Korean society and national concord and reunification and revive the harsh fascist dictatorship by completely throwing away the mask of "democracy" and "politics for the people" it wore in the early period of its office.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of the Fatherland bitterly condemns in the name of the whole nation the Lee group's said fascist suppression, branding it as a wanton challenge to the unanimous aspiration and wishes of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification and unpardonable criminal act to stem trend of the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 The south Korean people's struggle for independence, democracy and reunification can never be branded as a crime nor can it become a target of suppression.
					
					 To suppress the struggle for independent new politics, democracy and vital rights by branding it as "illegal" is, indeed, a crime and act of treachery as it is opposed to independence, the life and soul of the nation, and denies democracy, the aspiration and right of the people.
					
					 The Lee group has turned south Korea into a land under the reign of fascism where traitors judge patriots, injustice lacerates justice and human rights and democracy are totally trampled down. These are the crimes committed by the Lee group after it came to power. 
					
					 Neither independence nor democracy in south Korea nor peace nor reunification of the country can be expected as long as the Lee group is allowed to stay in power. 
					
					 The Lee group should face up to the developments and stop at once the fascist suppression of the organizations of the progressive movement.

articles.title: Settlement of Japan's Past Urged
articles.content:
Settlement of Japan's Past Urged
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Fifth Conference of the International Solidarity Council Demanding Settlement of Japan's Past was held in Netherlands from October 2 to 4.
					 Attending it were delegations and delegates of organizations demanding settlement of Japan's past and human rights organizations from the DPRK, Netherlands, Germany, UK, Canada, the U.S. and other countries and regions and victims of the war launched by Japan.
					
					 At the conference speakers said that such hideous crimes against humanity as sexual slavery, forced labor system and massacres committed by Japan after invading Korea and other Asian countries in the past are a wanton violation of the Hague Convention. They proved that it is the duty the Japanese government is obliged to fulfill in light of international law to make apology and reparation to the victims, and bitterly condemned the injustice and moral vulgarity of Japan's moves to evade settlement of its past.
					
					Testimonies were made by victims. Then, followed speeches by delegates of organizations of different countries and regions involved in the international solidarity council.
					
					 The speakers said that the parliaments of Netherlands, the U.S. and Canada and the European Parliament adopted and passed resolutions on the crimes related to the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army and have conducted various activities to build up international public opinion critical of Japan's past crimes and defend human rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They proposed such ways of settling Japan's heinous human rights abuses as further strengthening the international solidarity council and conducting positive activities to institute an international law related to the settlement of Japan's past in the future.
					
					 A resolution adopted at the conference strongly demanded the Japanese government, the Diet and enterprises make full apology and reparation for the past crimes against humanity and stop distortion of history at once, and stressed the need to escalate international solidarity activities to urge Japan to settle its past crimes.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The director of the International Relations of the People's Democratic Party of Uzbekistan issued a statement on the occasions of the 63rd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years formed the DIU with young revolutionaries of new generation of Korea and led the arduous armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists to victory and thus liberated the country.
					
					 The WPK has its historic roots in the DIU.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il has steadily developed the WPK into an ever-victorious party and an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people for more than four decades since he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					Thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il and the tested leadership of the WPK the DPRK has become a country with a national defence capacity powerful enough to smash any enemies.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people greater successes in their efforts to build an economic power and achieve the country's reunification single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Sweden-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of the advancement of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Noting that the reunification of Korea is an urgent issue in the world politics today, the statement said that the proposal set forth by President Kim Il Sung on Oct. 10, 1980 comprehensively clarifies the principle and ways for founding a federal state, duties of federal government and regional governments and corelations between them, name and character of the federal state and the 10-point policy of the federal state and others.
					
					 The statement referred to the fact that the north and the south recognized that the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation for the reunification of the country have things in common with each other and agreed to promote reunification in this direction in the future in the historic June 15 joint declaration in 2000, adding that this stand was reconfirmed in the October 4 declaration in 2007.
					
					 The statement called upon the political parties and organizations in different countries of the world to give wide publicity to the proposal for the DFRK and positively support and hail it.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, the Council for History Studies, the Institute for Public Management and the Council for World Studies in India in a joint statement issued on Oct. 13 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration noted that the Indian people hope that the declaration would be sincerely implemented and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea be achieved as early as possible.

articles.title: FDRP condena represion a entidades progresistas en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FDRP condena represion a entidades progresistas en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias llega a la etapa extremadamente grave la represion contra las entidades del movimiento progresista en el Sur de Corea, el portavoz del CC del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) hizo publica el dia 19 una declaracion.
					Pese a la unanime condena y rechazo en el interior y el exterior del pais, la camarilla fascista de Lee Myung Bak levanta la ola de arresto y represion contra los miembros de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos, el Consejo del Pueblo de Medidas contra la importacion total de la carne de res norteamericana y la Solidaridad por el Progreso del Sur de Corea, que se pusieron al frente de la justa lucha por la dignidad, la soberania y el derecho a la vida de la nacion, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Tambien reprime a la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte, el Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes del Sur de Corea, el Consejo de Organizaciones Juveniles del Sur de Corea y otras entidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion, que han venido impulsando el movimiento del 15 de junio por la reunificacion, la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana, calificandolas de "entidades pro-enemigas" y de "fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte" en virtud de la "ley de seguridad". 
					
					Son sometidas a duras penas las personalidades patrioticas partidarias de la reunificacion, que fueron detenidas y arrestadas una tras otra.
					
					Esto demuestra claramente que la banda de Lee intenta aniquilar totalmente las entidades y personalidades aspirantes a la independencia y la democratizacion de la sociedad surcoreana y a la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion y restituir la infame dictadura fascista quitandose la mascara de "democratico" y "politico para el pueblo", que se habia puesto a principios de su mandato. 
					
					El CC del FDRP condena categoricamente en nombre de toda la nacion tal represion fascista de la banda de Lee calificandola de desafio frontal a la unanime aspiracion y la demanda de los habitantes surcoreanos sobre la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion y de imperdonable acto criminal para bloquear la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio.
					
					Esta lucha de la poblacion surcoreana no puede ser incriminada ni objeto de represion.
					
					Reprimir la lucha por la nueva politica independiente, la democracia y el derecho a la existencia tildandola de "ilegal" deviene un crimen verdadero y acto vendepatria que se oponen a la independencia, que significa la vida de la nacion, y niegan la democracia, que resulta la aspiracion y derecho del pueblo.
					
					En su trayectoria criminal despues de la toma del poder la banda de Lee convirtio de nuevo el Sur de Corea en la escena caotica del fascismo donde los vendepatrias enjuician a los patriotas, la injusticia acosa a la justicia y se eliminaron totalmente los derechos humanos y la democracia.
					
					Si se deja intacta a esta banda, no habra en el Sur de Corea la independencia ni la democracia ni se puede esperar la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					La banda de Lee debe ver correctamente la situacion y abandonar de inmediato la represion fascista contra las entidades del movimiento progresista.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena represion de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena represion de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ATCC) -- Debido a la perversa ofensiva fascista de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, en la sociedad surcoreana se crea una atmosfera  de panico terrible y se ven reprimidos todos los habitantes aspirantes a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte de Corea calificandose de los "elementos proenemigos", "fuerzas izquierdistas" y "comunistas".
					Senala asi el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 19 y continua:
					
					Tal represion contra las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion es el desafio frontal a los habitantes surcoreanos aspirantes a una nueva politica y nueva vida y el imperdonable acto antinacional y anti-reunificacion para detener la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio dirigida a la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad y llevar al  fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Estas maniobras represivas devienen en su esencia el premeditado alboroto fascista para estrangular sin piedad las actividades de las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y las personalidades progresistas del Sur de Corea vinculandolas con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el rotulo de la "liquidacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas pronorcoreanas".
					
					Tambien, la horda de Lee cuestiona las actividades de susodichas entidades y personalidades del Sur de Corea calificandolas de "actos en favor del enemigo" que se cometen a "ordenes del Norte".
					
					Ahora, el "Servicio de Inteligencia" del Sur de Corea inventa hasta el "caso del grupo de espias" con el fin de denigrar la Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte.
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente a que grado llega  el acto imprudente de la banda de Lee tendente a aplastar despiadadamente las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion del Sur de Corea tildandolas de las "fuerzas izquierdistas a favor del Norte de Corea" y "actos proenemigos".
					
					Si se deja intacta esa represion contra las justas actividades patrioticas por la reunificacion, se eliminaran en el Sur de Corea todas las fuerzas democraticas pro-reunificacion y se resucitara el sistema dictatorial fascista. En fin de cuentas, se agravara la confrontacion Norte-Sur y se pondran obstaculos ante el camino por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, la banda de Lee Myung Bak nombro el infame maniaco de enfrentamiento Ryu Jong Ha como presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea que trata del problema de relaciones Norte-Sur.
					Esto demuestra claramente que esa horda no desea la reconciliacion, la unidad y la cooperacion con los connacionales ni quiere cambiar en lo minimo su intento de empeorar las relaciones con el Norte.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Tambien, ese acto contraviene al espiritu fundamental de la Cruz Roja cuya esencia es el humanitarismo y deviene el acto criminal antinacional y anti-reunificacion que esgrime la espada contra los connacionales que sufren de la division nacional y lleva al aprieto sin salida las relaciones Norte-Sur en crisis.
					
					Lee nombro tambien tales maniacos de enfrentamiento como titular del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" encargado del intercambio y la cooperacion entre el Norte y el Sur y el presidente del "Instituto para el estudio de la Reunificacion".
					
					Esto demuestra que las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de la banda de Lee sirven de la provocacion intencional y premeditada y que el reciente nombramiento del presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja se perpetro tambien en tal sentido.
					
					La horda de Lee compuso los organismos que tratan de los importantes problemas entre el Norte y el Sur de los elementos ultraderechistas dispuestos del ideal de enfrentamiento con el Norte de  Corea  en contraste con el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Este hecho prueba que esa pandilla no tiene la  minima voluntad de mejorar las relaciones bilaterales y  la reunificacion.
					
					Por tanto, esa banda es el peor colectivo anti-reunificacion que detiene el avance de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio y desea solo la desconfianza y el enfrentamiento entre el Norte y el Sur y el obstaculo de la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					Los gobernantes surcoreanos deben reflexionar profundamente de las consecuencias que emanen de su concepcion y su acto de enfrentamiento con la RPDC y actuar con prudencia  a partir de la posicion nacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ambicion de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ambicion de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 20 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos realizo primer vuelo experimental del bombardero estrategico "B-52H" dotado de bomba teledirigida por laser. Esta bomba sofisticada conocida como "magica" fue usada por primera vez en la decada de 1960 y reformada a base de las experiencias adquiridas en el choque armado y otros casos.
					A traves de un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el ensayo de ese avion cargado de dicha arma de exterminio masivo es un producto de la politica de garrote y ambicion hegemonica de EE.UU.
					
					Este imperio acelera el aumento y la modernizacion de sus fuerzas armadas hablando tanto de la "seguridad" nacional y la "proteccion" de los paises aliados desde la "amenaza" de alguien, comienza el comentarista y continua:
